item.title: Hydropower Was Ecuador’s Answer to Climate Change. Until the Drought Hit.

item.title: Where Is Russia Finding New Soldiers? Wherever It Can.
item.description: From murder suspects to immigrants to a former Olympic gold medalist, Russia pressures those it thinks should fight in Ukraine.

item.title: Lebanon’s Economy Reels From Israel-Hezbollah War
item.description: The conflict between Israel and Hezbollah may be suspended, but the damage is immense. “We came out of this war with nothing,” one man said.
